name: Plumage 257- Intro
description:
A project made for my narrative final assignment. 

Explore the creepy real life location of Plum Island and uncover the secrets of an animal disease research center that has pushed the bounds of what humans should be able to do. Find out what actually goes on and save your husband from an unknown threat.

Note: Currently only the intro, but if people are interested, I will gladly expand.
